name: box_area
description: Computes the area of a set of bounding boxes, which are specified by their (x1, y1, x2, y2) coordinates.

inputs.name: boxes
inputs.description: (Tensor[N, 4]) â€“ boxes where NMS will be performed. They are expected to be in (x1, y1, x2, y2) format with 0 <= x1 < x2 and 0 <= y1 < y2.
